reference_entities.description: A young girl around 5 years old with curly brown hair and bright eyes, wearing a light pink dress and white sneakers.
A classic plush teddy bear, medium-sized, with soft brown fur, black button eyes, and a red ribbon around its neck, inanimate form.
The teddy bear in magical living form, standing upright, glowing warmly with gentle golden light, radiating protective energy.
The teddy bear emitting a powerful, focused bright golden beam of light shooting upward, dispersing thunderclouds.
A large, dark-colored dog with sharp features and an aggressive stance, menacing but later fearful.
Bright, sunlit park with green grass, tall trees, paved walking path, warm natural sunlight, clear skies.
Same park under dark, gathering thunderclouds with distant thunder, dim shadowed lighting, cool blue-gray tones.
Park after teddy bear's light beam disperses clouds, calm with soft warm light, patches of sunlight, clearing skies.
Warm, cozy bedroom with soft warm indoor lighting, small bed with colorful blankets, toys scattered around.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Include medium wide and medium shots showing full body and facial expressions.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Natural warm sunlight and soft indoor lighting variants.
reference_image_plan.usage_notes: Used in all scenes; maintain consistent clothing and appearance.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Focus on plush texture and red ribbon details; close-up and medium shots.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Warm soft light for indoor and neutral daylight for outdoor.
reference_image_plan.usage_notes: Used as inanimate teddy bear in scenes 1, 5, and 6 (scene 6 per human feedback).

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Close medium shots emphasizing glowing fur and protective stance.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Warm glowing light contrasting dim environment.
reference_image_plan.usage_notes: Used in scenes 3 and 5 as living magical teddy bear.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Wide vertical shots capturing full beam height and cloud dispersal.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Bright golden beam with dynamic lighting and cloud effects.
reference_image_plan.usage_notes: Used in scene 4 to show magical light beam dispersing thunderclouds.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Medium shots showing aggressive stance, startled reaction, and running away.
reference_image_plan.usage_notes: Used in scenes 2 and 4 with emotional arc from menacing to fearful.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Wide shots showing open grassy areas, trees, and paved path.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Warm natural sunlight casting soft shadows.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Wide and medium shots showing dark clouds and shadowed park.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Dim, cool blue-gray tones with subtle lightning flickers.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Medium shots with soft warm light and patches of sunlight.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Soft warm light with golden hues and gentle shadows.

reference_image_plan.framing_notes: Medium shots showing small bed, blankets, toys, and window.
reference_image_plan.lighting_notes: Soft warm indoor lighting with cozy amber tones.

scene_reference_map.notes: Girl strolling happily holding inanimate teddy bear in bright sunny park.
Girl startled by menacing dog under dark thunderclouds.
Teddy bear comes to life glowing warmly, standing protectively between girl and dog.
Teddy bear emits powerful light beam dispersing clouds; dog runs away fearful.
Calm park with soft warm light; girl hugs glowing teddy bear comforted.
Cozy indoor bedroom; girl hugs inanimate teddy bear object feeling safe per human feedback.
